import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import './index.css'; import './css/bootstrap.min.css' class Calculator extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { costpermile:0, iPaid:"", gPaid:"", miles:"", mait:"", originalPrice:"", finalPrice:"", tolls: "", zip: "", } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleChange(event) { const {name,value} = event.target this.setState({ [name]: value, }); } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); let final = ((parseInt(this.state.originalPrice) - parseInt(this.state.finalPrice)) + parseInt(this.state.iPaid) + (parseInt(this.state.gPaid)) + parseInt(this.state.mait) + (parseInt(this.state.tolls) * 12))/(parseInt(this.state.miles) * 52); this.setState( {costpermile: final } ) } render(){ return(

Cost Per Mile Calculator

Fill out these questions to the best of your abilitiy as they are the basis of calculating your cost per mile

Cost per mile: $ { this.state.costpermile.toFixed(2) }
Current CPM: {parseInt(this.state.miles) !==0? ((parseInt(this.state.originalPrice) - parseInt(this.state.finalPrice)) + parseInt(this.state.iPaid) + (parseInt(this.state.gPaid)) + parseInt(this.state.mait) + (parseInt(this.state.tolls) * 12))/(parseInt(this.state.miles) * 52): "Error due to division by 0"}
); } } ReactDOM.render( , document.getElementById("root") );
